name: virtual-physiotherapy-platform
description: Virtual physiotherapy consultations with AI-powered posture analysis for Hong Kong

scripts.dev: npm run build:increment && concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run watch:build"
scripts.client:dev: npm run build:inject && cd client && npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:increment && npm run build:inject && cd client && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install

author: Virtual Physiotherapy Team
